description:
When tucked into the drop, or getting ready to drop onto a serious piece of slab, these glasses will help you stay focused on your line. Built for speed, the Incline have a semi-frameless design that keeps your vision clear when you need it most. Equipped with Ryders’ FYRE™ lenses, their most advanced lens technology ever, you get ultra-clear NXT photochromatic lenses that transition fast and deliver great contrast in all conditions. FYRE lenses help you will see what you need to see, in all conditions, no more fussing with lens changes.

  • Fits medium to large faces best
  • NXT photochromic lens. NXT lens material offers improved clarity over standard polycarbonate lenses and improves the durability and responsiveness of the photochromic lenses
  • Photochromic lenses change with the changing light conditions, meaning one lens takes you from overcast to bright sun
  • ColourBoost™ lenses deliver vibrant colours and excellent contrast, making them a great choice for challenging light conditions
  • Treated with a military grade anti-fog material. Anti-fog lenses perform best when clean. Simply wash the lenses with water and they’ll keep your vision clear. When not in use, store them in a warm, dry environment
  • Custom engineered frame and lenses increase airflow to reduce fogging
  • Anti-slip nose pads and temple tips keep the glasses in place
  • Grilamid TR90 thermoplastic frames are flexible, durable and light
  • 8-base lens curve provides face hugging coverage
name: Ryders Eyewear Incline Fyre Sunglasses

specs.key: Visible Light Transmission (Black/Grey Blue MLV Lens)
